attributes.description: World time at which animation started (ms since epoch)

attributes.description: Paused location/time (sec) within animation track

attributes.description: State of the animation (playing or paused)

attributes.description:
Which part of the avatar the entity is meant to represent (i.e. “head”, “body”, “right_hand”,
 “left_controller”)

attributes.description:
The relative offset of the bottom corner (furthest in the -x, -y, -z direction) of the box from
 the center

attributes.description:
The relative offset of the top corner (furthest in the +x, +y, +z direction) of the box from
 the center

attributes.description: The current state of the buttons being pressed represented by integer bits

attributes.description: What type of controller it is: 0->controller 1->hand 2->eye

Different states of CreatorVisibility, such as only visible to the creator, or only invisible
 to the creator

attributes.description: The radius of the dome in meters

components.name: com.meta.spatial.toolkit.Dome

attributes.description: Target Entity to follow
attributes.name: target

attributes.description: Pose offset to keep from target. Defining a quaternion will rotate the Entity
attributes.name: offset

attributes.description:
Minimum Y angle offset a followable will keep from target, 0 is straight ahead, positive values
 are up, negative values are down
attributes.name: minAngle

attributes.description:
Maximum Y angle offset a followable will keep from target, 0 is straight ahead, positive values
 are up, negative values are down
attributes.name: maxAngle

attributes.description: This is the change in distance needed to start moving
attributes.name: tolerance

attributes.description: How fast followable tracks to its desired location. Float value is a percent of default speed
attributes.name: speed

attributes.description: The type of behavior an object has when following (faces user, pivots on y axis, etc.)
attributes.name: type

attributes.description: Whether entity is actively following or not
attributes.name: active

components.name: com.meta.spatial.toolkit.Followable

attributes.description: Defines whether the object can be grabbed or not.
attributes.name: enabled

attributes.description: Whether the object is currently grabbed or not
attributes.name: isGrabbed

attributes.description: The type of behavior an object has when grabbed (faces user, pivots on y axis, etc.)
attributes.name: type

attributes.description: the minimum height an object can be held when grabbed
attributes.name: minHeight

attributes.description: the maximum height an object can be held when grabbed
attributes.name: maxHeight

attributes.description: The type of behavior the object can be hit using

attributes.description:
The radii of the rounded edges of the box, where the radii corresponds to the edges along that
 plane. (i.e radius.x corresponds to the edges running along in the x axis)
attributes.name: radius

components.description:
Defines the dimensions of a box shape with rounded edges by the relative offset of two opposite
 corners and a Vector3 of radii to modify the roundedness of the edges

components.description:
This component is used to indicate that an entity supports locomotion. When added to an entity
 with a mesh, it allows for default locomotion on the mesh
